title: Seeing Double? The Remaking of A Amenábar's Abre Los Ojos as Cameron Crowe's Vanilla Sky.

Focusing on Vanilla Sky (US 2002), the Hollywood remake by Cameron Crowe of Alejandro Amenábar's film, Abre los ojos (Spain 1997), it explores the similarities and differences between the two films.
